data.eml:eml: Fistulococcus, a new genus of soft scale insect (Sternorrhyncha, Coccidae) proposed for two new species from Hong Kong and Papua New Guinea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hodgson, Chris J., Martin, And Jon H. (2005): Fistulococcus, a new genus of soft scale insect (Sternorrhyncha, Coccidae) proposed for two new species from Hong Kong and Papua New Guinea. Zootaxa 1075: 1-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170318
